subject: Reinvestment of $10,000 Bond Maturing May 1
body:
Hello FinPower team,

My 5-year bond of $10,000 matures on May 1. I’d like to reinvest the proceeds into the same 5-year term at the current rate. Please let me know the next steps.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Request Principal Repayment for Maturing CD
body:
Dear FinPower,

My Certificate of Deposit (CD) for $5,000 matures May 3. I request that you transfer the full principal back to my linked checking account ending in 1234.

Regards,
Bob

subject: Refix My Loan Interest Rate
body:
Hi,

I have a fixed‐rate loan currently at 4.5%. Given recent rate cuts, I’d like to refix at the lower rate of 3.8%. Please advise on the process and any fees.

Best,
Carol

subject: Switch to Floating Rate for My Home Loan
body:
Hello,

I’m interested in converting my 30-year fixed mortgage to a 1-year floating rate. What margin would apply, and how quickly can this be done?

Thanks,
Dave

subject: Update Contact Details
body:
FinPower Support,

I’ve changed my mobile number. Please update my records to +1-555-123-4567 and my secondary email to eve.new@example.org.

Thanks,
Eve

subject: Question about your mobile app
body:
Hi team,

I can’t log into the FinPower mobile app after the latest update. It shows an authentication error. Can you assist?

– Frank
